channel.title: Please Help? []D[] [PI]
channel.description:
Okey iknow The Subject Is Not the best anyways: ------------------------------------------------ Ok. This is What Happens When A Donator Yells: [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/opodb4.png[/img]
This Is What Happens When A Donator Speaks? [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/fyinip.png[/img]
How Could i Change it So Yell Is The Same Time As Donator Speak All The Time Or Even Add :Donator: Sign To It? Ik its Client Sided But. Im Using The Basic Pi Client: Where You Have To HardCode * The Client To Change The Back Ground * With Tom Suite * Can U Please Link Me To $ < Rank Sign > And How To Add Client Side? And im Trying To Figure Out How To Add. It Where Every Time The Donator Talks Or Yells it Will Always Be Their?: --------------------------------------------------------------------
> For Owners , Admins , Mods < When They Yell in My Command ::Yell < its writtin like @yel@[ADMIN] < how Can i Change That So Its The Real Crown? Of Admin Insted Of? The Word [ADMIN]

item.title: Please Help? []D[] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @cdj cdj
item.description:
@cdj wrote:

so theirs no possible way of taking < like
case 1:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[0].drawBackground(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 14;
break;
New case? fliping it to donator? and loading the donator / sprite like c:/cache/donatoricon.png?
